name: MATCH IT FAST
description:
Origami rabbits with guns are trying to extinguish your flame ! You must strike back !

In Match it Fast, you play as a small match which travels an endless dungeon full of enemies and traps that are ready to stop you !

But be careful, you will only have a couple of seconds before you burn down, how far will you get ? Will you reach the top of the leaderboard ?

Controls :
Movement : WASD / Left Joystick
Dodge : Spacebar / L2
Shoot : Mouse 1 / R2

This game was created for the Ludum Dare 51 event : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/match-it-fast

You can play the game in your browser here : https://mathisbressaud.itch.io/match-it-fast-web

Created by Mathis Bressaud, Paul Lyaudet, Charlie Morel
